import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-provider-next-modal', templateUrl: './user-provider-next-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-provider-next-modal.component.css'] }) export class UserProviderNextModalComponent { dropdownOpen: 'none' | 'provider' | 'role' = 'none'; selectedRole: string[] = []; phoneNumber: string = '+966'; showPassword = false; showConfirmPassword = false; Role = [ { name: 'Customer', selected: false }, { name: 'Provider', selected: false }, { name: 'Merchant', selected: false }, ]; Providers = [ { name: 'Company', selected: false }, { name: 'Establishment', selected: false }, { name: 'Office', selected: false }, ]; filteredProviders = [...this.Providers]; selectedVisibility: string = ''; roleProviderMap: { [key: string]: string[] } = { 'Customer': ['Company', 'Establishment'], 'Provider': ['Establishment', 'Office'], 'Merchant': ['Company', 'Office'], }; toggleDropdown(type: 'provider' | 'role') { if (this.dropdownOpen === type) { this.dropdownOpen = 'none'; // Close if the same dropdown is clicked } else { this.dropdownOpen = type; // Open the clicked dropdown and close others } } updateSelectedRole() { this.selectedRole = [this.selectedVisibility]; this.updateFilteredProviders(); this.dropdownOpen = 'none'; // Close dropdown after selection } updateFilteredProviders() { const roleProviders = this.roleProviderMap[this.selectedVisibility]; if (roleProviders) { this.filteredProviders = this.Providers.filter(provider => roleProviders.includes(provider.name) ); } else { this.filteredProviders = [...this.Providers]; } } togglePasswordVisibility() { this.showPassword = !this.showPassword; } toggleConfirmPasswordVisibility() { this.showConfirmPassword = !this.showConfirmPassword; } onPhoneInput(event: Event) { const input = event.target as HTMLInputElement; if (!input.value.startsWith('+966')) { input.value = '+966'; } if (input.value.length > 13) { input.value = input.value.slice(0, 13); } this.phoneNumber = input.value; } }
